abstract: The first lady speaks at a Walgreens on the South Side about her goal of reducing childhood obesity.
snippet: The first lady speaks at a Walgreens on the South Side about her goal of reducing childhood obesity.
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO -- Michelle Obama took an afternoon away from fund-raising for her husband's re-election campaign on Tuesday to draw attention to another - and far less divisive - goal: reducing childhood obesity.

headline.main: In Chicago, Michelle Obama Takes On 'Food Deserts'
